casebody.data:

v.
William M. RUSSELL ; K.E. Smith Revocable Trust; Myers Revocable Trust; Kim Russell; Sharon Huff ; Ben Weidling; the Lamar Companies ; U.S. Treasury by and Through the Internal Revenue Service; Montana Sweetgrass Ranch Homeowners' Association, Inc.; Doe Defendants I Through X, Inclusive, Defendants, William M. Decided: January 8, 2019

Affirmed.
